resources.string: Trending Tags On Flickr.com! more options coming soon

"Clarifai is a image recognition system founded by Matthew Zeiler. Once an image has been selected, it will be sent to the Clarifai API for image recognition. Tags will be returned based off the image; however, image recognition is a very complex technology, this app cannot guarantee the accuracy of the returned tags. Enjoy."

Images are pulled off Flickr.com. This app is made to pull images off specific “safe” photo groups instead of the general pool of public photos. This way it can help prevent / minimize mature rated photos. This also means that photo searches are based off a photo group instead of all the possible photos; this means there is limited amounts of tags being able to be searched for.

Everything here is based on tags, so when searching for images be sure to “think like a tag” and be aware of spaces. E.g. searching “star wars” is not recommended over searching “starwars” due to the nature of the tagging system on Flickr.com.

One section of this app uses Clarifai which uses image recognition to identify tags based off images. These tags may or may not be correct and is out of our hands. These tag results are also being searched in a limited way since there is not saying on what tag may appear.
